segments.text: Hi , Peter . I didn't see you last night . Where did you go ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was almost on line the whole night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you play network games the whole night ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I listened to the music , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you going to do now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm tired . I need a rest .
segments.speaker: S1
